description:
Description :
        [Translated by Mosh Scans]"The sight of Natsume, disheveled thanks to me, was the most tantalizing thing I'd ever seen." Natsume is a beautiful fox spirit whose hobby is to play around with people by bewitching them. Today's target is Takato, a handsome tailor. Despite the sudden invitation, he managed to escort him like a gentleman, and somehow, Natsume found himself unexpectedly drunk. When Natsume woke up, he found himself in Takato's luxury apartment. "This is the first time..." he began, "I've seen such quality fur." He began to play with Natsume's sensitive ears and tail, kissing and caressing deeply until he became all sticky and sluggish.+
